blogPost.title: How do you set and track goals in a remote organization? Answer by @KFishner, Chief of Staff @HashiCorp. https://t.co/fOVnpNAhWI https://t.co/sFwEPKfdYK
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 遠隔地にある組織では、どのように目標を設定し、追跡するのですか？Answer by @KFishner, Chief of Staff @HashiCorp. https://t.co/fOVnpNAhWI https://t.co/sFwEPKfdYK
在一个远程组织中，你如何设定和跟踪目标？由 @KFishner, 办公室主任 @HashiCorp. https://t.co/fOVnpNAhWI https://t.co/sFwEPKfdYK 回答
